item.title: Microclimate Workshop and Species on the Move Conference 2023
item.description: Several members of the Scheffers Lab, including myself, headed down to Bonita Springs in South Florida for the 2023 Species on the Move Conference. This was the third conference in this series, and drew about 300 attendees from (by my rough guess) 35 nations or so.
